title: [3 YoE, Unemployed, Graphic Designer, United States]
text:
Cooper Munch

Graphic Designer

cooper.munch@gmail.com | (312) 555-0147
behance.net/coopermunch
linkedin.com/in/coopermunch

Education

Lakeview University                                                                 August 2018 – May 2022
B.S. Visual Communication Design

Experience

Hearth & Home Furnishings    Chicago, IL                                                     January 2023 – August 2025
Virtual Retail Specialist
• Recommending furniture pieces based on customer’s needs
  via chat, email, phone, and in-person
• Maintaining knowledge of store policies, products, and inventory
• Providing friendly, informative, and honest customer service
• Assisting guests design customized upholstery using customer’s
  preferences and design principles

Brightline Creative Group    Evanston, IL                                                       January 2022 – May 2022
Apprentice Graphic Designer
• Producing brand identities and promotional deliverables for various
  Lakeview University organizations, programs, and events
• Consulting, interviewing, and updating clients
• Scheduling and managing tasks in order to meet deadlines

Skills

Technology Snapshot:
• Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop)
• Procreate
• Google and Microsoft Office Suite
• Workplace Management Software (Asana, Notion, Workday)
• Intercom

Core Strengths:
• Branding & Identity
• Typography
• Print Design
• Packaging Design
• Visual Storytelling

Languages: English (fluent), Tagalog (conversational)
